definition: gap/to separate/to thin out (seedlings)/to sow discontent
between/among/within a definite time or space/room/section of a room or lateral space between two pairs of pillars/classifier for rooms

sentences.english: The three of us stood in the bathroom eagerly waiting for the telltale line to appear.
sentences.chinese: 我们三个一起站在洗澡间殷切等待仪器指示线的出现。

sentences.english: Each bedroom in the hotel has a bathroom en suite.
sentences.chinese: 该旅馆每间卧室都有一洗澡间自成一套。

sentences.english: I have to share the bathroom with the other farants.
sentences.chinese: 我得和别的房客共用洗澡间。

sentences.english: This house had no bath so we had one built.
sentences.chinese: 这间房子原无洗澡间，我们补建了一个。

sentences.english: I have to share the bathroom with the other tenants.
sentences.chinese: 我得和别的房客共用洗澡间。

sentences.english: Leave the laundry in the laundry bag behind the door of the bathroom.
sentences.chinese: 把待洗的衣旅敢呑洗澡间门后的洗衣袋里就行了。

sentences.english: Moreover, each unit comes up with a latrine and bathroom.
sentences.chinese: 每个避难单元配有厕所和洗澡间。

sentences.english: What are you doing in my bathroom?
sentences.chinese: 你在我的洗澡间里干什么？

sentences.english: Bythe time she got up, her brother had already gone into the bathroom.
sentences.chinese: 到她起床的时候，她的弟弟已经去洗澡间了。

sentences.english: Designed for people who come up with great ideas in the shower.
sentences.chinese: 专为那些能在洗澡间想出好主意的人士设计。

sentences.english: For a bathroom I have two thermos bottles of water and an enameled bowl.
sentences.chinese: 洗澡间里的两个热水瓶和一个搪瓷盆是用来洗澡的。

sentences.english: He doesn't like the house without bathroom.
sentences.chinese: 他不喜欢没有洗澡间的房子。

sentences.english: There's a bag in the bathroom. Just put your laundry in it.
sentences.chinese: 在洗澡间里有个袋子，把要洗的衣服放在里面就行了。

sentences.english: I slept in small family hotels recommended by locals, invariably a room with a bath.
sentences.chinese: 我住在本地人介绍的小旅馆里，房间总是带有洗澡间。

sentences.english: He looked in the bathroom to make sure that he was alone.
sentences.chinese: 他看了看洗澡间，确定是否只有他一个人。

sentences.english: B. The bathroom and the kitchen are well-furnished.

definition: washbowl/basin for washing hands and face
